abstract: Florida Gov Rick Scott plans to sue Obama administration for pressuring state to expand Medicaid, major part of Affordable Care Act.
lead_paragraph: The governor of Florida, Rick Scott, says he plans to sue the federal government for using coercive tactics to get the state to expand Medicaid, a major part of the Affordable Care Act.

headline.main: Florida Governor to Sue Obama Administration Over Medicaid Expansion
headline.print_headline: Florida Governor Accuses U.S. of Pressuring State to Expand Medicaid

snippet: The governor of Florida, Rick Scott, says he plans to sue the federal government for using coercive tactics to get the state to expand Medicaid, a major part of the Affordable Care Act.
